markdownContent:
“Sorry, the museum's closed on Mondays. We're open Tuesday to Sunday, 10 to 5.”

“Ah,” you stumble. “I'm not a visitor, I'm starting an internship here today.”

“Perfect, you must be the student Alex has sent us then! Great, two more helping hands in the house.”

Somewhat suspicious of how, exactly, you came to this position and who did whom a favour to get you here, you shake his hand and introduce yourself.

“Nice to meet you too, I'm Frederic Luzon, the collection manager. It's great to have some support over the summer, these objects won't go into the database by themselves! I guess you're supposed to see Laura first. Shall I take you to her?”
